mapper.sql: a.agentLevelId AS "agentLevelId", a.roleId AS "roleId", a.salesPolicyIds AS "salesPolicyIds", a.name AS "name", a.cashPledge AS "cashPledge", a.createDate AS "createDate", a.createBy AS "createBy", a.updateDate AS "updateDate", a.updateBy AS "updateBy", a.state AS "state", a.delegateAgent AS "delegateAgent"
mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM was_agent_level a
AND state=1
ORDER BY createDate DESC
ORDER BY ${page.orderBy}

SELECT count(*) FROM sys_role b LEFT JOIN sys_role_menu c on b.id=c.role_id LEFT JOIN sys_menu d on c.menu_id=d.id WHERE (d.permission=#{0} or d.permission=#{1}) and b.id=#{2} and b.del_flag='0' and b.role_type='代理商'
select a.id,a.name from sys_role a WHERE a.role_type=#{0} AND a.del_flag=0 ORDER BY create_date DESC
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM sys_user a WHERE a.agentLevelId=#{0}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM was_agent_level a WHERE a.name=#{0} AND a.state=1
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO was_agent_level( roleId, salesPolicyIds, name, cashPledge, createDate, createBy, updateDate, updateBy, delegateAgent, state ) VALUES ( #{roleId}, #{salesPolicyIds}, #{name}, #{cashPledge}, #{createDate}, #{createBy.id}, #{updateDate}, #{updateBy.id}, #{delegateAgent}, #{state} )
